name: Kevin Waldrup
text:
Drivers and staff are rude ill mannered disrecepectful to customers. Will not make nehiles available to customers after 5pm when calls are made to to try and set arrangements after hours. Has no interest in trying to help customers regain their vehicles. OWNER WILL MOT ACCEPT RESPINSIBILITY FOR HIS WORKERS NOR WILL HE RETURN PHONE CALLS.

VERY VERY VERY POOR WORK ETHICS AND BUSINESS VALUES. DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL.

name: Garrett Putman
text: Knowing that the only way to get your vehicle back is to pay whatever they say, They happily take advantage of the people that are already in a bind enough as it is. Also when you go in there the women behind the desk will let you know she's busy on Facebook with a glare and a look as if she smelled something unpleasant.... top notch

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave your feedback. We're sorry we didn't provide you with the best experience that we could have. Please reach out to us at (205) 405-1888 to let us know how we can improve.

name: Beth Phillips
text:
It took the tow truck over two hours to after I was told it was dispatched to make a 30 minute trip. Only after giving them ample time and allowing for traffic did I call back to be told the had taken another call, one that was made after they told me the truck was on the way. Come to find out they have a contract with the state. which I understand. But if they are going to take another call and put it before mine I would think they would have the common decency to at least give me a call and let me decide if I wanted to wait three times what I was expecting. Their price was also a good $75.00 above the going rate.
I was uneducated on towing services, but now know better. I would not recommend Hank's unless you have plenty of time and don't really care how much you spend. A disaster from start to finish. Horrible business practices to leave a customer waiting all that time without at least a courtesy call.

name: Andrea Kay (Andie)
text: April 2, 2021 I was in a horrific accident, another car changed lanes into me on the interstate running me into the guardrail, which spun the car I was driving around and smashed it into the guardrail three more times. I was traveling with two dogs and hours away from home. To say I was a mess doesn't cover it. Your driver and his partner were professional, and went above and beyond helping me get myself and my dogs to a pet friendly hotel, getting all of my luggage and dogs in. Unfortunately I left the paperwork he gave me in  his truck but please know he is absolutely an asset to your business and I'll forever be grateful for the treatment and professional manner I was treated in that evening! Drivers like him are a rarety and kiddos to him!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Andrea. You can call on us any time, and we will be there for you.

name: Samuel Moore
text:
They professionally picked up my car and towed it 40 miles in time for me to still go get my other vehicle and go to work.
I am very satisfied with them and will use them again.

name: Jason Dowling
text: They don’t honor the time posted on the door. I was there at 4:45, (Monday) they close at 5. I get people like to cut out a few minutes earlier sometimes, I do. I really needed some things from my vehicle, and dispatch was rude as hell. I wouldn’t recommend if you have the option

resp.text: We're so sorry. We hate to let a customer down. If you have time please call us at (205) 405-1888 so we can discuss your concerns in greater detail. We hope to hear from you. Thank you

name: David Pilgrim
text: My late father's truck got towed after 12 midnight on a Friday my son was driving the truck and went to jail , monday I called and they said 330 to get it out remind you they only towed it 2 miles when I got over there about 1 they said 390.00 they charged another 35 dollars because I wasnt there at 12 the reason and I told them I had to go to my brothers house and get my dads death certificate to get a release on it anyway the Pell city police dept said they had  few complaints on them ,I finally talk them into 360.00 but that low down shame they would take advantage of people charging that much oh it was a 100 admission fee plus 200 just for towing it 2 miles , what is the admission fee for I dont mind paying 200 towing it 2 miles which is high but then they add 100 admission fee what the hell is that for plus 35 aday storage. it should have been 200 to tow 70 storage for 2 days not 390 they wanted. that's doing people wrong and they get by with it because if you dont pay what they want you dont get your car , they got a hell of a racket going on and I'm wfiting the chief of police so they can discuss it over the next council meeting hopefully they wont be towing for Pell city a more,  and that fat boy that was there is lucky I kept my cool because I dont play no games especially when. I'm being ripped off  it was his lucky day I gave him a pass because I dont let fat boys run there mouth at me ,he must be used to talking to others like that. just beware if you call Hanks towing be ready to empty your wallet to them and that administration fee on top of towing I dont understand that ha! ha! That's a good one ,you got me this time but never again

resp.text:
Mr. Pilgrim,
All of our pricing, No matter the jurisdiction involved, Are equal in all amounts and are within regulation(s) of the state of Alabama and all local municipalities.
The administrative or "Admin" fee that is charged reflects the costs we have to pay to search within the Alabama Department of Revenue and if applicable, any other state in which the vehicle is registered, to obtain the names of the registered owner and or lienholders (If applicable) on any vehicle pulled in, Reason being as so we don't get someone coming in with a handwritten bill of sale for example, stating that they are the owner of whatever vehicle they may see in our lot is theirs, It's a safeguard measure we take to keep any customers property secure, And to ensure only the rightful owner of the vehicle is allowed to even touch it.
Your invoice copies will reflect that our storage charges are $30 per day, Which added in to your total price accrued of $360, And paid in full.
My apologies on having to meet on social media as a platform for resolution.
Please don't hesitate to contact us for any future towing needs, We'd be glad to amicably assist you in any way we can.

name: Elaine Lasseter
text: Had to pay $125 service fee and $7 per gallon of gas. They only brought 1 gallon of gas and our car still would not start. To bring more gas would cost another $125 service fee. My mom, daughter and I were left on the side of the road to try and find another way to get my mom to dialysis. This is the 2nd time we have called to hire this tow company just to be left on the side of the road

resp.text: Our team wants to extend our sincerest apologies concerning the issues that you have faced. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest quality standards for our customers/clients; we hope you will give us an opportunity to discuss your concerns further with you. You can reach out to us at (205) 405-1888. We hope to find a solution promptly.

name: Bigbodi Status
text: I was satisfied with him moving a storage unit building from 1 location to the next. All went well I appreaciated their service they were perfessional well mannered prompt curtious and on time and the pricing he gave was fair justifiable to the job done. 👌👌👌👌💪💪💪💪👍👍👍👍👍👍👍 I rock with Hank towing company and if I need him again I would defintly  call on him again.     💪💪💪👆👍✌💃💃💃💃 Thank you very kindly  indeed

resp.text: We appreciate the 5 stars! Thank you for rating Hank's Towing Service! We invite you to contact us again for your towing needs. We'd be happy to provide exceptional service to you again!

name: Karin Liddle
text:
Fast and professional!!!
Good people!!!
Thabk you Mason😁

resp.text: Feedback like this is what we like to hear!

name: Brittney Busbee
text: They were rude to me from the get go. Horrible. Do not use them.

resp.text: We're very sorry you were treated like this. Our customer's experiences are essential to who we are. Please give us a call at (205) 405-1888 and tell us what happened so we can improve.

name: Billy Ford
text: They never showed up, Left us hanging

resp.text: Our customers are very important to us and we are sorry to hear we may have let you down! Please reach out to us at (205) 405-1888  when you're able so we can discuss this situation further.

name: Charles Ousley
text: Professional and good attitude.

resp.text: Hey there Charles, thanks for the kind words! Take care and have a great day!

name: Tony Parker
text: Called to have car towed to a shop.  Said it would be approximately an hour, which was not a problem.  An hour later they arrived to pickup the car.  Driver introduced himself (Tony), very cautious as he loaded the car, extremely nice and friendly.  Very satisfied!!!

resp.text: Tony, thank you for the kind words!

name: Kristi Glass
text: Great service and great people

resp.text: Kristi, thank you for your 5-star review of Hank's Towing Service! We are happy to hear we could provide great service. Take care!

name: Keena Lowery
text: Mason was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. He was kind and made sure I was taken care of! Truly appreciate all he done this morning.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Lowery for the 5 stars and kind words!

name: johnny nixon
text: There when we call yo are always there And that is good business And one where pulling a mobile home out and we get stuck we always call you all and you never have no problem coming to get us

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review of our towing service, Johnny! We're so glad we could be there for you, and provide you with efficient and reliable service!

name: Freddy Stanford
text: Hank's towing service got me out of a real jam, and didn't steal anything out of my vehicle!!! I'd give them 6 starsif they had it!!

resp.text: Hello and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Hank's Towing Service and what we offer. Thanks and have a great day!

name: Chris Fraser
text: Excellent company. Friendly service from start to finish. Punctual, courteous, and professional recovery technicians. VERY fair pricing on the recovery work they performed. 10/10.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. It was our pleasure to be of service.

name: Kristian Bunt
text: Just got my inoperative truck towed over to my grandmother's house. VERY pleased with the service. My driver was extremely nice and gave great service! Very pleased with the price as well. Will definitely use Hank's towing again!

resp.text: Hopefully, you won't need our service again, but if you ever do we're only a phone call away. Thank you for the five stars!

name: Ashley Haynes
text: Horrible horrible customer service. So very rude. They took my car Thursday night at 5:30 and we're supposed to drop it off somewhere that is 10 min from my house. I called the body shop at 1:20 pm on Friday he said they never delivered it. So I called Hanks. She was so rude and said at 8:10 on they were closed. Umm yep 3 hours later they would be. The guy at the body shop said that he got a call at 8 am saying they would be delivering it. Well they still had not. They said they needed to hear from the insurance company. So I called Geico. She said they already had the order put in. The lady at Hanks was so rude.  They were talking about us and saying he muted it but it was not. I have it all recorded. The lady at Hanks said it will be $325 to pick it up because Geico said to leave it in their lot which they did not. So Geico told her she was having someone come pick it up and give payment. 1 hour later they said they were closing and that someone could get it Monday Morning.  The guy from Geico that schedule the pickup on Thursday said wow that was the worst customer service I have ever had. And now I see what he is talking about.  DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY. They are crooks. They did that just to get extra money.

name: TaeBeastlyArt
text: False advertising. They don't buy junk cars and the lady that answered the phone was very rude. I was asking about their services and she hung up in my face. Very unprofessional.

resp.text: Hello. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We do not condone this type of behavior from any of our staffs, and we'll be looking into this. Please, contact us directly so we can gather more information about this incident.

name: Jessica Davis
text: It was 12:30 am and I was broke down on the side of a 2 lane highway and call my insurance roadside service and unfortunately they couldn't help me. Called Hank's Towing Service and they were glad to help. I would recommend this company to anyone.   Thank you for your help.

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review, Jessica. Our team at Hank's Towing Service always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Until next time, take care

name: Shannon Clanton
text: The driver was very nice and right on time for when they said

resp.text: We're happy to hear you had an awesome time with us at Hank's Towing Service! Thanks for sharing your experience. We hope you stop by and see us again soon.

name: Kim Bentley
text: I thought they did a great job. My car was stuck in mud in the middle of the night/morning and would not budge. They were there to help me in no time. Hopefully, I won’t have a need to, but if I’m ever in a situation in which I need towing assistance again, I would definitely call them.

resp.text: Kim, thanks for the five stars. We're grateful for the review, and while we also hope that you don't get stuck in the mud again if you ever do don't hesitate to give us a call!

name: Alvin Gray
text: If you're ever in need of a tow in or around Lincoln Al your number one choice is Hanks hands down! I'm a owner operator and Kenny really went above and beyond to help me. I didn't think service like this was still in existence. I am truly grateful! Thanks Kenny. Hank's will always be my number one choice

name: Timothy Richey
text: Just ok

resp.text: Thanks for the four stars! Have a great day.

name: Keith Martin
text: Quentin and his son Michael were the most polite and curtesy guys I have met. They worked safe and quick to help me get unstuck. Michael was raised right By his dad he showed manners  and Always said yes sir no sir

name: Krissy Cinnamon
text: My car broke down on a very dangerous part of the highway in 100 degree temperatures on Monday. I was an hour from home and completely stranded. They showed up VERY quickly, made sure I was safe, and got me quickly to my mechanic. They even offered to stop at a store and let me get a drink because the weather was so hot. Friendly, fast, and dependable. THANK YOU!!

resp.text: Friendly, fast, and dependable are the types of service that we aim to deliver! Thank you for taking the time to lave us such a great review.

name: Brian Anthony
text:
I didn't use Hank's in the conventional sense, But my insurance (progressive) sent a driver out to my home to pick up my deer damaged vehicle and take it to Birmingham for Progressive to look at.
Your driver was Joey, And I haven't had a better experience with anyone during this period than he was. The tow truck the police called out to pick my truck were nice and quick, But when they asked where I wanted them to take it to, they seemed a little bit annoyed that I wanted it to go to my home, as I wanted to talk with my insurance agent first. I suppose they prefer taking them to their place or a body shop.
When they unloaded my truck, a good bit of the plastic from the headlight and grill fell out on the tow truck, And the driver just brushed it off into my yard where my truck was sitting. I didn't think much of it, I'd just clean it up in the morning when I went out to take pictures to start working with my insurance.
I talked to my insurance, They told me because it's a newer model truck,  That they would have someone from their salvage provider come pick it up, I believe it was 3 days later when I got a call from a lady from IIA or IAA, saying that she was about to be giving a driver the information to come pickup my truck and verified my address and the damages with me.
Not too terrible long after I spoke with her and said ok to having another tow truck company come out, Joey actually called me when he was roughly 30 minutes away from my home to verify my address and that everything was ready to go. He showed up just as he said and came to the door and got me to explain why he was there, And actually gave me the rundown on the process of what would happen if progressive did or did not total my truck. I handed off my keys to him, He went and got  his truck from the street and backed it in to where he'd be able to load it up. Before he backed up into the location, he did ask me if I had septic in the area (I I didn't)  He said he always asks when he has to enter a yard,  Said he's never had a problem with accidentally finding a tank but really didn't want to have to make phone calls explaining a problem!  LOL!
He got down under my truck and did his work with some chains, Put it in neutral to wind it up his truck and chain it down. Now, this is where I became surprised,  He picked up every piece of plastic and debris that had come from my truck and put them in the bed. I never asked him to!
I asked why he did and he said he wanted it to be just as if he and my injured truck were never there. I'm still amazed that there a people that have that mindset.
We talked for a few more minutes as he finished loading and chained my truck down, I asked where they were out of and he gave me a business card with everything on it. I'm in Chilton county, So it's not feasible for me to call a company that's an hour plus away,  But he told me that you have trucks all over the place at any given time, And to call if I needed help, That you might be right down the street!
As I said early on, I never thought that my best experience in this headache would have been the guy that picked up my truck and towed from my home to Progressive's auction yard. It ended up being totaled,  But I'm loving my new blue f150!
Thank you to Joey and Hank's!

resp.text: That is so amazing to hear, Brian! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Hank's Towing Service. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day!

name: Rob Mathis
text: They came for us broken down on I-20 on a Sunday morning. Recommended!

resp.text: Thanks for recommending us, Rob! We're glad we were able to help. Call us whenever you need us, we're here to help 24/7

name: William Caldwell
text: Extremely good service. Kenny knows his job well. Safety orientated and very thorough. Reasonably priced. 5 stars ☆☆☆☆☆

resp.text: Thank you for the compliments. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a positive review.

name: Julie Wilcox
text: Lost tire. Called Hanks. They answered right away. Sent a truck right away. Got to us way quicker than expected. Timmy was wonderful. Got us to the recommended tire place. We are getting our new tire put on right now. All of this in 25 min. Excellent. I highly recommend these guys.

resp.text: We do our best to be quick and efficient while still offering great customer service. Thank you for the review, Julie. We're happy we were able to be of assistance.

name: Star Jennings
text: Answered the phone promptly, assisted with narrowing down my location in a moment of panic and a friendly gentleman arrived within a reasonable time. Very helpful. I will call again if I have another situation in need of a tow!

resp.text: We know that when you need our services you can be in a bad situation, so we're happy to hear that we were able to help during a moment like that. Thank you for leaving your feedback here. We're grateful for the positive review.

name: Ande Zimmerman
text: Love these folks!! They have helped me, and people I know several times and I’d recommend them to anyone!!! Honest and hard working folks

resp.text: Ande, thank you for taking the time to leave us such great feedback. We're happy to hear we were able to provide five-star service.

name: Renee Martin
text: Absolutely amazing. On Memorial day moving from IL to AL for the military the trailer I was pulling my car on broke instantly they came out in less then 20 mins towed my car and removed my car from the trailer it was on. Was very helpful and knowledgeable and possess awesome customer service.. I would call them everytime for any of my towing  needs and other services they provide.

resp.text: Renee, we're grateful for the positive review. Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback on your experience with u and for the recommendation. It's one of the best forms of thanks we can get.

name: Virginia Franks
text: Very prompt service. Did a good job at a fair price.

resp.text: We're happy we earned five stars, Virginia! Thank you for taking the time.

name: Roger Kirkland
text: broke down in pell city after buying a vehicle.placed a call to hanks towing and only had a 20 minute wait at the most. the driver was justin.b, super nice guy knew exactly what he was doin and very professional. i drive a tow truck for a company out of jonesboro georgia so i know what to look for when getting towed from another company and justin took the time to do every step the right way.  if i ever need a tow again in the state of alabama i will be calling them again

resp.text: Thank you, Roger, for taking the time to share your positive experience! We're glad you chose us and we appreciate the recommendations. Thanks again and have a great day.

name: Callie Zimmerman
text: My driver was awesome! He went above and beyond for me. Would recommend for sure!

resp.text: We appreciate the recommendation, Callie. We do our best to make every experience with us a pleasant one.

name: Jacob Harris
text: This place is a joke workers have attitudes dont know what they are doing the lady in the pellcity office was verynice and helpfull but if u need a tow or anything use somebody else they are crooks and like i said a joke

resp.text:
Hello Jacob,
We are sorry to see this as this is not how we do business. Please contact us directly and we will work to turn this around.

name: Jason Simmons
text:
Do not CALL!!!! They are liars and will leave you stranded and never come. I was .5 mile from them. I could see there lot and they said they were coming. 2 hrs later said they were coming 4 hrs later said they were coming. I finnally called ABC Towing. There in 30 mins. Hank never showed up or called to find us. Do not give any business they are liars and will tear your vehicle up towing it.

Again do NOT do business with these guys. The owner is not being truthfull. They quit answering there phone and never came to get me off the side of the road. They claimed there was an accident and 6hrs later they still never came. Dispatch wouldn't give me drivers phone number and she said she could not get in touch with driver because the drivers don't answer their phones when at wreck scenes. All LIES. I called another company and they instantly gave me the drivers number and the driver was there within 30 mins.

resp.text:
Hello Jason,
At the time that we scheduled your pickup, we were rerouted to a fatal accident scene which altered our timeline. We hope you understand and apologize for any inconvenience on our behalf. We will work to resolve this at no charge. Please reach out to us so we can speak further.

name: Stephen PIKE
text: Skys limitless repo uses Hanks for all vehicle calls and none have been left behind yet,,,..

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review, Stephen.

name: Regenia Rowell
text: We had a building scheduled to move for a week with a very limited time frame. Waited on them ALL day. Were told when we would have to call them they were delayed but would be there. It never happened. No call. No show.

resp.text:
Hello Regenia,
Please give us a call, we only do building moves on Saturdays and don't have a record of you in our system.  If the mistake was in the scheduling, it is extremely important for us to know how the ball was dropped so that we can avoid the situation in the future.
Thank you,

name: monique harger
text: He is quick and very professional A1!!!

resp.text: We appreciate the five stars! Thank you for rating Hank's Towing Service and have a great day.

name: Blake Bice
text: Awesome people! Very helpful

resp.text: Thank you for saying so. We appreciate the feedback.

name: Travis Burdick
text: These people are amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating Travis. We appreciate it.

name: Nigel Henderson
text: Towed me out quick

resp.text: We are super excited to hear about the positive experience you had with us Nigel. Thanks.

name: Judy Collier
text: Always quick to arrive and helpful

resp.text: It was our pleasure, Judy! Thank you so much for your review!

name: Amanda Huish
text: I have had a car towed before by another company that was the worst. Hanks towing is far from that. They seemed to really care about people more than money

name: Jason Watkins
text: Really great experience!

resp.text: We appreciate the excellent rating Jason. Thanks for the feedback.

name: Jantae Shaw
text: Horrible service. If you can even get anyone one the phone. They will lie to you and tie up your entire day

resp.text:
Hello Jantae,
We apologize for any inconvenience that you experienced on our behalf. We intend on providing the best service in town. Please contact us directly and we will work with you.

name: Jim Goodman
text: Broke down on interstate one mile from there shop .talked to the lady ten times four hours later still no tow truck.but she still says on the way beware of those liers

resp.text:
Hello Jim,
Here at Hank's Towing Services, this is not how we conduct business. We have not been able to locate you in our system but invite you to reach out to us directly so we may find out exactly what happened here. We apologize for any inconvenience.

name: Darlene Willis
text: Was there quick when called.

resp.text: We value our customers' time and work to prove it. Thank you for your business and review, Darlene.

name: James Samples
text: Awful service had me waiting for four hours in a broke down car and never showed up tried calling with no answers. 0 stars!!!

name: Joe W
text: I couldn't ever get these guys on the phone. And when I finaly did they never showed up. Then they charged me $30 a day for my car sitting there when these guys don't know how to use there phones...

name: Manuel Hernandez
text: Called for a tow scheduled to be picked up 7am talked with Kenny he said yes sir would be there so it could go in get a new radiator, the shop told him 8 o clock so he could have it done before 5, sad to say didn't get there till 2, on top of that was told by Kenny him self that if I had to stay the night he would split hotel cost .. never happen ... would not ever again use Hanks towing cause of how lazy and dishonest the guys are .... 0 star rate for me ..

name: Shane Adkins
text: Driver was nice

resp.text: Hi Shane. Thanks for leaving us some feedback. If you ever need us again, we'll be going after that 5th star.

name: Scott Knepper
text: I have used three times.

resp.text: Thank you for your repeat business!

name: auston carlisle
text: Fast and reliable

resp.text: Thank you for saying so, and thank you for the review!

name: Trinity Garage
text: Great service

resp.text: Great service is what we aim to deliver, Steven. Thank you for the positive review!

name: explorer9955zxx
text: pricy

name: Frances Mendoza
text:
I called to get a vehicle towed and the first lady was nice, but another female in the background  was yelling and got on the phone, She would not let me explain i was having MY vehicle towed to my office. Very unprofessional.:
updated Your response is not correct in regard to that phone call The business was identified in the beginning of the conversation and your female associate was the only rude one. Had she stopped yelling I would have explained that that was fine but my personal vehicle also needed towing from a different location.

resp.text: We don’t do any Repo’s at all, someone in your office was trying to pull one over on us, acting like it was a normal tow which it was not… they failed to say it was a repo and then they got a attitude when we told them we don’t do them and if we did it would cost more than a regular local tow.

name: Spiritisalive1
text: Driver was very professional, arrived when he said he would. Handled all my business with a dealership in another county. Made the whole experience stress free. Definitely will use them again.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We're glad you had a good experience. Take care.

name: Janice Alldredge
text: I was denied  getting a receipt  from the driver.  Said, Ace towing didn't do that. I needed it for my  records. I sure would  appreciate it if you sent  us one. Driver was very nice.

resp.text: Hi Janice. Thank you for reviewing us and offering your sentiment. Please call us at (256) 571-7397 so we can further discuss. Thank you!

name: Ann Loyd
text: I've used Ace towing several times. I appreciate their service.  They have always taken good care in getting the job done and getting me back on the road. I highly recommend 👌

resp.text: Thanks for being a repeat patron, Ann! We appreciate the review!

name: James Derringer
text:
This company has been around for awhile and continue to hire new people. I never understood why they had such a high turn out until this year. The manager/owner has an absolutely terrible attitude with his staff. I don't care how cheap a business is if they treat the employees like this I will do my best to avoid them. I've personally witnessed his angry attitude while waiting to pick up my truck from a wreck. When you run a business your employees make it efficient. Without good employees you can't have a great business.

I wrote this for my grandpa, he is over 80 and asked me to help him.

resp.text: I hate you feel this way but 99% of the time when we hire new people Is because we are growing and buying more trucks so yes there is a lot of new people   And I like to hear more about this wreck your talking about call us so we can understand more what you are even talking about 256 571 7397

name: Heather Chandler
text: Great company! I have used them multiple times. Never a long estimated time of arrival. Always friendly. Help any way they can.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5-star rating of our towing service, Heather! We truly appreciate the feedback, take care!

name: Blake Welch
text: Jerry was a great service provider helped me get where I needed to go and was very friendly

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Blake. Call us if you need towing or roadside assistance in the future!

name: Shirlee Bailey
text:
This company was used by my insurance roadside assistants. They said that because I had All-State insurance they were not putting me first because All-State doesn't pay well. That tells me that it's not about who is in need of help, but how our insurance pays them. I sat on the road for almost 6 hours with 3 kids.
When I called the place in which my car was to be towed, they said it was never delivered.
My vehicle was still sitting on the road even after I was sent a text saying it would be picked up at 4:37-4:52, only it was moved about 600 feet to where we initially stopped. The kids built a pyramid of rocks while playing in the ditch, which was approximately 600 feet to where the car was. Which tells me they loaded it then put it back down. WHY IN THE WORLD WOULD YOU DO THAT? Never again.

resp.text: This was on a very busy day, we told this potential client that we would get to her once we were finished with the calls that had come in earlier. She demanded that we get to her first and after some very uncomfortable phone calls we decided that we did not want to do business with said potential client. We informed the roadside insurance of this decision.

name: Michelle Smith
text: If you want to be talked over when trying to speak or talked rude to this is the company to use. I called them to explain something just like my insurance company asked me to do. Jason was very rude telling me I shouldn’t even be dealing with him only my insurance company should call him. First off its our vehicle and I’ll call all I need to about it especially when instructed to do so by my insurance company. I was belittled and talked to rudely. Our company will not use them again. We also requested our truck be dropped off at home 3 miles from the accident. He said oh no let me take it to my lot so the insurance company will come out faster. Which we let him do and it cost us $2800.00 because they didn’t come out faster and it sat there from 6/26-8/21. I’ll say the lady in the office was always nice when I spoke with her but Jason who I believe is the owner has no customer service skills. When someone calls to ask about their vehicle you should be willing to answer any questions they have and be nice about it regardless if they have their insurance company involved or not. Especially when you’re telling me a different story then my insurance adjuster told me minutes before I called you.

resp.text: This was not a issue on Ace Towing this was matter of insurance wasn’t notified properly, and when they did come we had to do what they told us to do, we strive daily to help and be reliable to ALL our customers. Thanks

name: austin croslyn
text: If you need service and are seeking the best and most knowledgeable around, ask for Brandon Bartlett by name. Unprecedented knowledge and respect. 5/5 stars!

resp.text: Hello and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at ACE Towing LLC and what we offer.

name: Julie Pendergrass
text: When you call, ask for Brandon Bartlett for excellent customer service and support when you need it the most. He works hard and gets the job done in a timely manner.

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review! Our team always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Hopefully you stay on the road with no issues, but if you ever need towing services again, we hope to hear from you. Take care!

text: Roger Bearden came out in the cold and rain to tow my vehicle even gave me a ride to his house so it was convenient for my husband to come get me there. Really appreciate all he did.

resp.text: We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to servicing you with all your towing needs in the future!

name: Vickie Thompson
text: I use this wrecker service at all times. I have had to call them to unlock my car they were quick and they had good timing since I had left my car running and it was summer time. I've had to use the towing service on numerous occasions. The service is great my cars have never been damaged. I have heard from several people that when their car was towed it was damaged but not from this company. I know several people that's always used Ace Towing. My family uses Ace Towing as their primary towing company. They towed my car to the location I need it for its repairs or to my own home so I do not have bills for it being in the Wrecker lot. As for this service is a one place that I recommend to anyone who's in a situation of needing towed or if their car has been locked up and there are locked out. I like the speediness of them getting to where I'm at when I need them.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us Mr.  Umesh, we hope to work with you again soon

name: Logan G
text: Best Company to move heavy equipments!

name: Donna Brown
text:
I'll be using this company again.
I am ill-equipped to be able to deal with this situation but Brett accomplished everything I paid for.
I was given an itinerary that was delayed by 1 hour(Unexpected road work).
This company understands what their job is and takes the pressure off of myself.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Donna, we hope to work with you again soon

name: Debby Fischer
text: I used G an G Auto to ship my car from Sacramento to  the Trenton TX area. I paid their deposit of $150 after they first quoted $100 and quoted first $800 then $850 to do the job. My son signed the contract and then the issues started. They were supposed to pick up my car on March 26, 2021 so it could get to Trenton Tx by end of March. They never called and I had to call them. Told me the driver is running late will call in the AM of March 27, 2021. Never called and no pick up. This repeated for 2 days. No one ever called back and I always had to chase them. Finally, a supervisor called back told me they driver was AWOL, the guy John who I was dealing with was fired and now they have to find a new driver,  like that was my fault. Took them days to get back to me after I spoke to another supervisor who said she would call back and guess what… no call back. Finally, they said the had a new driver and it would cost $1400 with $150 already paid so I would have to pay the driver $1250. After my son already signed a contract for $850. When I asked for a discount for my trouble and extra cost to rent my rental car for another week they told me no. I do not know how this company has such a high rating with the BBB when they obviously extorted $400 dollars from me to get my car to Trenton TX and another $700 for the extra week of my car rental. Not to mention they never called back and were dishonest from the beginning. This company is horrible. Find a different company and do not  trust rating from the BBB.

resp.text: We apologize about this please provide me an order # since i checked and we do not have an order under Debby Fischer.

name: Julie Weagley
text: I hired them to transport my vehicle. For two days I was told that they would have a driver to pick up my car, several calls from me as to when they were going to be able to get the car. Told that they were having a difficult time finding a driver because the rate was too low. They rate that I was quoted by Brett at G&G. So I cancelled the service because they couldn't deliver what they promised. Then they have the nerve to change my debt card $200.00 without my authorization. I will be disputing the charge. You want to loose money and waste your time then this is the company for you.

name: Yolanda Neil
text:
This was my first experience with shipping my vehicle across country. Brett from G & G was the first person I called back after getting an overwhelming amount of shipping quotes. I shared with Brett he will the first contact I made and would continue to look around at other rates. Brett made sure I knew the right questions to asked, how to research other company as well as G & G.
After speaking with other companies, I came back to Brett and G & G, due to the knowledge, responsiveness, transparency and customer service Brett offered. I would truly recommend G & G to anyone looking to ship their vehicle and know that you will receive quality service. Overall because of Brett’s ability to make me feel valued and he was working to meet my needs I would recommend G & G.

Thank you Brett for all you help!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Mrs Yolanda, we are proud to have met your expectations. Keep our contact and share it with you family and friends please. We hope to work for you soon!

name: SuperchargedSS1
text:
Scam artists. Their contracted driver provided a phony certificate of insurance.  When I brought it to Brett's attention he said he was going to talk to his supervisor and straighten it out.
He lied and never provides the correct one.

After trusting them his driver proceeded to cancel the pickup 1 hour before the agreed to time.  Now G and G refuses to refund the $150 deposit.  A fraud case with the cc has been opened as well as a case with the FMCSA.

THIS COMPANY IS BAD NEWS. STAY AWAY

name: Jim Cuch
text:
Diana De Paz was fantastic. I really felt like she had my best interest in mind.

I actually went with another broker first and then cancelled for their poor customer service. Diana stepped up, won my business and had a driver ready to pick up the vehicle within the hour.

Thanks!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Mr. Jim, we hope to work with you again soon!`

name: Asim Kazimov
text: I ship vehicles all the time, I've used other car shipping companies before but I'm sticking with this one. Brett gives me the best price and works really hard to meet my expectations "Promply and Efficiently". The best part is that they are available 24/7! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback Mr. Asim, we are happy to have met your expectation. We are looking forward to working with you again soon.

name: Daniel Sloane
text:
I signed a contract with G and G Transport to have a vehicle transported from Florida to New York! After many many calls to someone named “Diana”, I think there must be 5-6 women named Diana there! I signed a contract with them on March 12th, 2021. The vehicle was supposed to be picked on March 26, I called that day and asked for a time windows of when they would be picking it up! I was then told they were still looking for a driver!!! This is 13 days after I signed the contract! They’ve done nothing about contacting me about pickup! They don’t return my calls, and I called their head office more than 90 minutes ago! He said he would call me right back! He didn’t!
I would avoid this company like Covid 19! They have no clue what they’re doing and here I am, with a flight booked to Ny tomorrow morning, and my vehicle sits in my driveway!
I would have to say, this is one of the worst companies I have ever dealt with!
Dan Sloane/Angelo Gencarelli

resp.text: we apologize for  this please in the future call at 256 272 9998

name: Dayana Miller
text:
jlg E450AJ
profesional company, they help me move my Boom Lift 100% recommended

name: Michael _
text: They did a good job. There were a couple delays in picking it up, but the shipment arrived on time. Fairly priced & legit.

resp.text: Thank you very much for working with us!

name: Toni Sandoval
text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!! I was in contact with Elsy for a month and she was very communicative, very friendly, very responsive. I was so excited to work with them until the Friday before my scheduled transport. She stop responding she strung me along all day believing that my vehicle would be picked up on the 26th and around 2pm she just stopped responding. I didn’t find out until after 5pm that my vehicle wouldn’t be picked up and  she hadn’t even notified me that the date would be pushed back or that she didn’t even HAVE A DRIVER!!! If you need transport I highly recommend Brad at Lightning Auto carriers

resp.text: We apologize for what happened Toni next time ask for a manager or call me at 256-272-9998 to prevent this from happening.

name: Gino Carlucci
text: George called me names, failed to pick up the vehicle for 3 days, Overcharged me, Carrier said they were getting 750 and good ole George charge me 1050.00 Stay away from these guys.

resp.text: Sir we had 3 different drivers at different times, it's not our fault you could have the car ready. You working with multiple brokers doesn't help eather. We recoment choosing a company next time and stay loyal to them to avoid something like this from happening again. Your refund has be completed. Have a blessed day.

name: Tim Duncan
text: This company offered the best price to ship my vehicle from Alpharetta, GA to Knoxville, TN.  I also checked their claim and they are indeed highly rated by the BBB.  Great personal service at a great price.  My personal thanks to the lovely Maria for seeing this through, because she was  there for me day and night.  So sweet, professional and helpful.  Thanks G&G Auto Transport, especially to Maria.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.

name: justin parsons
text: ***BEWARE*** DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.  I scheduled a pickup for 7/31 to deliver my new vehicle from FL to NC.  Adam Gomez gave me a price of $600 and said my vehicle would be picked up and possibly delivered on 7/31but delivery would be no later than 8/1.  I called Adam at 8:30 AM on 7/31 to confirm pickup.  He said he would call me back in a hour or two.  At 1:30 PM, the car lot I purchased the vehicle from calls me.  They said they have here heard from G&G.  I called Adam and he told me they do not have a driver yet.  I told him that this was poor communication and he needed to call me back with a scheduled time for pickup.  At 6 PM I call G&G back and speak with someone different who says they still do not have a driver for my vehicle.  At 8 PM I receive a text from Adam saying they have a truck for $900 that can pick my vehicle up Sunday.  This is two days later than my original quote I and $300 more.  If you do not want your time wasted, use another company.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Justin I'm sorry to hear about your bad experience with our company, We're normally known for our exceptional attention to detail, and we regret that we missed the mark. Covid-19 has drastically changed the industry; prices are changing constantly, driver are staying home, there are looting and rioting all over the states etc. If you don't mind giving me a call at (256) 464-2554 at your earliest convenience, it would be greatly appreciated. We look forward to speaking with you and working toward earning back your business.

name: lana giorgobiani
text: The best price to ship my vehicle from NJ to FL.  Great personal service at a great price.  Personal thanks to Mr. Adams to make this transaction very easy and pleasant.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us, we hope we can do business in the future.

name: Sonia Cedeno
text: I contacted this company and am giving them a good review not because they deliver my car not to their fault but because they were very professional and kept me informed on details. Hunter was absolutely very professional and great to deal with.

resp.text: Thanks a lot for your feedback mrs Sonia Cedeno, we hope to work with you again :)

name: Warren Mccloud
text: I needed to get a car transported from Houston to Milwaukee, Wisconsin ASAP they made it happen. Great customer service, GREAT PRICE, and nice and respectful driver, car was picked up Friday made it to Milwaukee, Wisconsin that Sunday in perfect condition. I would definitely recommend GNG Auto Transport

resp.text: Thank you choosing us and we are happy to have met your expectations!

name: Jason Dennis
text: I dont usually give negative reviews unless a company deserves it. And this company absolutely deserves it. I was to have my car shipped on a certain date and was ensured the driver would come. I ended up having to wait two days because the company was telling me false information and when I cancelled my pick up they never gave me my money back. This company is a sham and I wish for it to close down due to horrible services.

resp.text: Jason, we are truly sorry to hear that, our driver had many hiccups  at delivering a unit to the port and therefore he was unable to get to you fast enough, we apologize for everything please call me at 256-272-9998 to see how we can work it ask for Logan im the manager, we would love to get your business back.

name: Buba Jarjue
text:
GNG AUTO TRANSPORT VERY VERY POOR WHEN IT COME TO SERVICE, on Thursday the 08/13/2020 sign a contract for my truck to be pick up in Charlotte Nc I told them the due date for my truck to be pick up is Friday the 08/14/2020 they make a promise the truck will be pick up Friday morning not to worry.
So since they promise it will not pass the due date I was not worried.The date of the pick up around 1:45pm they call coming with lots of excuses the truck was never pick up the due date which end up costing me $160 cause the place was not open the entire weekend.
This is bad business promising a customer and not fulfilling it so please be careful with this company GNG AUTO TRANSPORT WHEN DOING BUSINESS WITH THEM BEFORE WHAT THEY DID TO ME HAPPENING TO YOU. I WILL NOT RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY WHEN COME TO MOVING YOUR CAR/TRUCK.

resp.text: Hi buba, sorry to hear what you went through i did not know about it any concerns please call me to find a solutions to the issue my name is Logan..

name: jasmine cisneros
text: DONT waste your time. They kept us waiting the whole day saying that they were going to pick up the vehicle and I already didn’t trust them so the unresponsiveness  definitely did it. It’s all about communication and that’s something they just couldn’t do.
